title: I´d like to have my "Your Shop" back
body: As the title sais, I already opened my shop before it went down, and I would like to get my old offers back. Thanks a lot.

replies.body: Porocles, I sent a ticket and they said they couldnt retrieve my offer from my old shop so now I don't have the chance to buy 2 skins I wanted with that massive discount :(
If you opened it and viewed offers, they have a record of it and will honor those offers if you can tell them which one you want to take advantage of.

We can help with this, just hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take a look!  Be sure to include which items you wanted from the first set, and that you have enough RP on the account.
I want that too. I read that if we write them a ticket? they will give us the old shop we got back. I dont know how to write them a ticket tho

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

I´m pretty sure that´s the website you were looking for.
